Title: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION TWENTY-FOUR HUNDRED AND EIGHTY OF THE ADMINISTRATIVE CODE.
Data:
[ Act No. 3000, February 09, 1922 ]
AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION TWENTY-FOUR HUNDRED AND EIGHTY OF THE ADMINISTRATIVE CODE.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. Paragraphs (d) and (h) of section twenty-four hundred and eighty of the Administrative Code, as amended by Act Numbered Twenty-nine hundred and ninety-one, are hereby amended to read as follows:
"(d) He shall collect, as deputy of the Collector of Internal Revenue, by himself, or deputies, all taxes and charges imposed by the Insular Government upon property or persons in the city of Manila, depositing daily such collections in the Insular Treasury."
"(h) He shall deposit daily all municipal funds and collections in the Insular Treasury or in a Government depository."
Section 2. All acts or parts of acts inconsistent with the provisions of this Act are hereby repealed.ℒαwρhi৷
Section 3. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, February 9, 1922.
